p: Rhizosphere soil of L. camara suppressed the growth of Achyranthes aspera L. and Albizia lebbeck [ 54]. Rhizosphere soil of L. camara also reduced the germination and seedling growth of Avena sativa L., Cicer arietinum L., Hordeum vulgare L., and Triticum aestivum L. [ 55]. These observations suggest that the rhizosphere soil of L. camara may contain some allelochemicals. The allelochemicals may occur during the decomposition process of plant residues in the soil and/or as leachates from living plant parts and root exudation.
